## Factors


```{r}

class(murders$region)

```

```{r}

print(murders$region)

```

```{r}
levels(murders$region)
```

```{r}

region <- murders$region
value <- murders$total

print(region)

region <- reorder(region, value, FUN = sum)
print(region)

levels(region)

```

## List

```{r}

record <- list(
  name = "john Doe",
  student_id = 1234,
  grades = c(95, 82, 91, 97, 93),
  final_grade = "A"
)

record

```

```{r}
record$student_id

```

```{r}
record[["student_id"]]
```

record2

record2[[1]]
